#labels netflow,inputformat
= Traffic Analysis Format =

== Introduction ==

Traffic analysis format can be categorized on OSI 7 Layer.

== Format ==

=== Layer 4 Format === 

Input Format  : 
{{{
<Src IP> : <Src Port> : <Protocol> : <Dst Port> : <Dst IP> : <Number of Bytes Sent> : <Number of Bytes Receive>
}}}

ex) 192.168.0.1:1234:7:80:10.1.2.3:1040654:2333

=== Layer 3 Format ===

Input Format : 
{{{
<Src IP> - <Dst IP> - <Number of Bytes Sent> - <Number of Bytes Receive>
}}}

ex)192.168.0.1:10.1.2.3:1040654:2333
